statements.update: UPDATE xqp_Attachment SET LastModifier=#LastModifier#, LastModTime=GETDATE( ), Title=#Title#, FileName=#FileName#, MimeType=#MimeType#, FileSize=#FileSize#, Remark=#Remark#,Downloads=#Downloads#,OwnerShip=#OwnerShip# where Id = #Id#
statements.delete: delete from xqp_Attachment where Id = #value# DELETE FROM [dbo].[xqp_Attachment_Entity] WHERE AttachmentId = #value#
statements.select: SELECT xqp_Attachment.Id, xqp_Attachment.Creator, xqp_Attachment.LastModifier, xqp_Attachment.CreatedTime, xqp_Attachment.LastModTime, xqp_Attachment.Title, xqp_Attachment.FileName, xqp_Attachment.MimeType, xqp_Attachment.FileSize, xqp_Attachment.Remark, xqp_Attachment.Downloads ,xqp_Attachment.OwnerShip FROM xqp_Attachment INNER JOIN xqp_Attachment_Entity ON xqp_Attachment.Id = xqp_Attachment_Entity.AttachmentId WHERE (xqp_Attachment_Entity.EntityId=#EntityId#) AND (xqp_Attachment_Entity.EntityType = #EntityType#) order by xqp_Attachment.Title asc
